release_notes: BUG FIX: Added navigation button to SDR configuration step. Users can now save SDR configuration and proceed to location setup. PREVIOUS FIXES: Removed all external command dependencies from detection script (cat, tee replaced with shell built-ins). FEATURES: Full FTDI UATRadio support, enhanced setup wizard with device type badges, smart configuration with automatic driver selection, seamless multi-SDR support for mixed hardware setups.
